column3: Doesn’t call UTCDay - why write a function if you don't use it?
dayOfWeek doesn’t return all days of the week
Good start, but some minor issues:
Don't use pre-calculated constants for arithmetic without explaining where they came from
Many of your numerical conversions are inefficient
localDay should not cast to an int
You've imported some modules you don't need, might want to review your VSCode preferences
If you write a function, you should use it (i.e., UTCDay)!
Due to subtracting 3 after %7, you're going to get negative days, which will be a problem. See "TestResults.txt"
Good start, but some issues related to repetitive code & negative days
An else block could catch unexpected input and print an error message for debugging that can be helpful!
Remember to update the Collaboration Line in the README.
Too much comments also makes code difficult to navigate/read! Try to just get at the Bare minimum of functionality/explanation.
Small note: comments only have to be one/two lines long and not necessarily complete sentences.
